short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Replaces the pinyin in World of Cultivation with english terms. (doesn't replace ling, ye, ge, etc. b/c those words are too basic)

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension converts the untranslated pinyin terms in World of Cultivation on https://wwyxhqc.wordpress.com to english. Please report any bugs or mistranslations, thanks
